spiritsExplanation: The workout takes place on the Charles River, suggesting a strong 'Outdoor & Adventure' element. Rowing on a river incorporates natural challenges and scenery, which fits this spirit well, justifying a high score of 0.8. The title 'Control Your Rhythm Row' emphasizes control and rhythm, and along with the description mentioning 'varying rhythms,' indicates a focus on pacing and coordination, aligning with the 'Flow & Rhythm' spirit with a score of 0.7. The mention of the music playlist, including tracks like 'Something Big' and 'Jungle Love,' further supports the rhythmic aspect. Lastly, the workout's moderate intensity and 'sweat' format suggest some energy but are not indicative of an extremely high-intensity session typical of 'High-Energy & Intense' workouts, thus this spirit is not assigned.
